info.description: CRM Relation API for customer, project, and sales pipeline management
info.title: Straye Relation API

get.description: Get paginated list of activities with optional filters

parameters.description: Filter by activity type (meeting, task, call, email, note)
parameters.name: type

parameters.description: Filter by status (planned, in_progress, completed, cancelled)
parameters.name: status

parameters.description: Filter by target type (customer, project, offer, deal)
parameters.name: targetType

post.description: Create a new activity (meeting, task, call, email, or note)

get.description: Get current user's incomplete tasks (assigned tasks that are not completed or cancelled)
Get activity status counts for the current user's dashboard
Get upcoming scheduled activities for the current user within a specified number of days

parameters.description: Number of days to look ahead (1-90)
parameters.name: daysAhead

parameters.description: Maximum number of activities to return (1-100)
parameters.name: limit

get.description: Get a single activity by its ID

post.description: Mark an activity as completed with an optional outcome

get.description: Returns a paginated list of audit log entries with optional filters
Returns audit logs for a specific entity
get.summary: Get audit logs for an entity

get.description: Exports audit logs for a time range as JSON
Returns statistics about audit log actions for a time range
Returns a specific audit log entry
Returns the current authenticated user with roles, company, and permissions info
Returns the full list of permissions for the current authenticated user
Get paginated list of contacts with optional filters
Get a contact by ID with all relationships

post.description: Add a relationship between a contact and an entity (customer, deal, or project)

delete.description: Remove a relationship between a contact and an entity

get.description: Get paginated list of customers with optional filters

parameters.description: Search by name or organization number
parameters.name: search

get.description: Get a customer with full details including stats, contacts, active deals, and projects

delete.description: Soft delete a customer. Cannot delete customers with active projects, deals, or offers.

get.description: Get all contacts associated with a customer

post.description: Create a new contact and associate it with the specified customer

get.description: List deals with optional filters

parameters.description: Filter by stage (lead, qualified, proposal, negotiation, won, lost)
parameters.name: stage

parameters.description: Sort by (created_desc, created_asc, value_desc, value_asc, probability_desc, probability_asc, close_date_desc, close_date_asc, weighted_desc, weighted_asc)
parameters.name: sort

post.description: Create a new deal in the sales pipeline

get.description: Get forecast data for upcoming months
Get all deals grouped by stage for pipeline view
Get aggregated statistics for the sales pipeline
Get a deal by ID with full details including stage history
Get activities for a deal

post.description: Advance a deal to the next stage in the pipeline

get.description: Get the stage history for a deal

post.description: Mark a deal as lost with a reason
Reopen a lost deal as a new lead
Mark a deal as won and optionally create a project

parameters.description: Create a project from the deal
parameters.name: createProject

parameters.description: Offer ID to attach file to
parameters.name: offerId

get.description: Get paginated list of notifications for the current user

parameters.description: Filter to show only unread notifications
parameters.name: unreadOnly

get.description: Get the count of unread notifications for the current user

put.description: Mark all notifications for the current user as read

get.description: Get a single notification by its ID

put.description: Mark a single notification as read

delete.description: Delete an offer by ID. Only offers in draft or in_progress phase can be deleted.

post.description: Transitions an offer from sent phase to won phase. Optionally creates a project from the offer.

400.description: Invalid offer ID, request body, or offer not in sent phase

get.description: Get the complete budget breakdown for an offer including all dimensions and summary

200.description: Budget breakdown with dimensions and summary

get.description: Get all budget dimensions for a specific offer with pagination

post.description: Add a new budget dimension to an offer. Either categoryId or customName must be provided.

put.description: Update an existing budget dimension for an offer

delete.description: Delete a budget dimension from an offer

put.description: Reorder the budget dimensions for an offer. All dimension IDs must be provided.

post.description: Creates a copy of an existing offer. The cloned offer starts in draft phase.

400.description: Invalid offer ID or request body

get.description: Get an offer including budget dimensions and summary calculations

post.description: Recalculates the offer value from budget dimensions
Transitions an offer from sent phase to lost phase with an optional reason.

400.description: Invalid offer ID, request body, or offer not in sent phase

post.description: Transitions an offer from draft or in_progress phase to sent phase.

400.description: Invalid offer ID or offer not in valid phase for sending

get.description: Get paginated list of projects with optional filters

post.description: Create a new project. Requires manager or admin permissions.

get.description: Get a project with full details including budget summary and recent activities

put.description: Update an existing project. Requires manager or admin permissions.

403.description: User is not the project manager

delete.description: Delete a project. Requires manager or admin permissions.

403.description: User is not the project manager

get.description: Get recent activities for a project
Get budget information for a project including spent amount and remaining budget

post.description: Inherit budget dimensions from a won offer to the project. The offer must be in 'won' phase.

parameters.description: Offer ID to inherit budget from
parameters.name: request

400.description: Invalid request or offer not in won phase

403.description: User is not the project manager

put.description: Update project status with optional health override. Requires manager or admin permissions.

403.description: User is not the project manager

get.description: Returns a list of users (currently only returns the authenticated user)
Get all contacts related to a specific entity (customer, deal, or project)

createProject.description: If true, create a project from this offer

project.description: Only present if createProject was true

includeDimensions.description: Default true - clone budget dimensions (nil treated as true)

includeFiles.description: Default false - files are not cloned by default
